alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 09 at 4:18PM PDT until September 10 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Strong east winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Apple and Lucerne Valleys, Coachella Valley, San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...Until midnight PDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
